node.title: Venue outside Whakatāne being sought for trial over Whakaari eruption
node.description: The trial into the health and safety failings leading up to the Whakaari eruption is likely to be held outside Whakatāne.
node.content:
["The trial into the health and safety failings leading up to the Whakaari eruption is likely to be held outside Whakatāne.", "", "
Whakaari / White Island erupted on 9 December 2019, killing 22 people. Photo: Supplied / Lillani Hopkins
", "Twenty-two people were killed when the volcano erupted in December 2019.", "WorkSafe has charged 13 parties with health and safety breaches.", "Usually trials are heard near where an incident occurred.", "But at a court hearing into the venue, the judge found it is impractical to hold the entire trial in Whakatāne.", "Judge Thomas said he is considering just having the opening and closing there.", "The hearing has been adjourned for the Ministry of Justice to find more suitable options."]
